squat.knees_over_toes: Knees past your toes. Push them back.
squat.go_deeper: Go deeper! Try to get below 90 degrees.
squat.keep_back_straight: Keep your back straight throughout the movement.

pushup.keep_body_straight: Keep your body aligned. Don't raise or drop your hips.
pushup.align_elbows: Align your elbows. Both at the same angle.

plank.lower_hips: Lower your hips. Keep your body in a straight line.
plank.raise_hips: Raise your hips. Don't let your belly sag.
plank.level_shoulders: Level your shoulders. Don't twist your body.

lunge.knee_over_toe: Knee too far forward. Step back.
lunge.keep_torso_upright: Keep your torso upright during the lunge.
lunge.go_deeper: Go deeper! Back knee almost to the floor.

general.session_start: Let's go! Position yourself in front of the camera.

subscription.limit_reached: Session limit reached. Upgrade to continue.
